title: What is the name of this game? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't know which game you're thinking about but a little bit more context can make this easier to answer. Are the cars you previously drove transparent, and allow you to drive through them? Is the objective to drive as fast as possible or as safely as possible? Is there a time limit? What is the theme? Are you a Taxi driver, a car thief? Are the cars all the same or all different? What system is the game for? PC, PS4, Xbox? If you can provide some more details, even if they seem insignificant you will have a much better chance of getting an answer but the information you provided is very limited.
The game is called “Does not Commute”, made by Mediocre. This is the official page for the game, where you can also find the links for the relevant app stores: Does not commute - Mediocre blog
